body_html:
@saeta Could you comment on how to support this case using cluster spec propagation/cluster resolver?

In a 1 worker 1 ps setup, we start the worker first using cluster spec propagation. Then the machine which is supposed to run ps failed and ps ended up running on a different machine with a different IP. In this case the master service in the worker can't recognize the new ps since cluster resolver has already translated the IP/port information for the ps.
